com.interpss.core.dclf

Interface DcLoadflow

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.hazelcast.nio.serialization.DataSerializable, org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject, IDclfResult, NameTag, NetworkRef<AclfNetwork>, org.eclipse.emf.common.notify.Notifier
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    DclfAlgorithm
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DclfAlgorithmImpl, DcLoadflowImpl

    public interface DcLoadflow
extends NetworkRef<AclfNetwork>, IDclfResult
    A representation of the model object 'Dc Loadflow'. Class for defining Dclf algorithm object

    The following features are supported:

    • Dclf Calculated
    • Apply Adjustment
    • Adj Max Iterations
    • Adj Tolerance
    • Acc Factor
    See Also:
    DclfPackage.getDcLoadflow()

      • calculateDclf

        boolean calculateDclf()
               throws InterpssException,
                      ReferenceBusException,
                      IpssNumericException
        Calculate DC Loadflow and cache the results. Branch flow results are cached in the aclfBranch.weight and aclfBranch.intFlag
        Throws:
        InterpssException
        ReferenceBusException
        IpssNumericException

      • getDclfSolver

      • setRefBus

        void setRefBus(java.lang.String busId)
        set ref bus identified by busId for the analysis. [B] matrix is set dirty also.
        Parameters:
        busId - bus id

      • setRefBus

        void setRefBus(java.lang.String[] busIdAry)
        set ref bus for the analysis according some rule. For example, select a non-gen and non-load bus. [B] matrix is set dirty also.
        Parameters:
        busIdAry - a list of bus ids which should not be set as the reference bus.

      • setDclfSolver

        void setDclfSolver(IDclfSolver solver)
        set Dclf solver object
